00054       GRID_SAMPLING

00110     template < typename align_T> bool
00111     run(std::vector<align_T> *alignments, const align_method_t align_method)
00112     {
00113       // Call the scoring method with the desired scoring class
00114       if(A_args->score_str.length() == 0 ||
00115          A_args->score_str == "default"){
00116         std::cout << "using default scoring method\n"; 
00117         score(alignments, align_method, 
00118               new ScoreRigidAlignments< WeightedSumsScore, point_and_surf_score,
00119                                         align_T >(A_model, *A_args));
00120       }else if(A_args->score_str == "WeightedSumsScore"){
00121         std::cout << "using site map points only scoring method\n";
00122         score(alignments, align_method,
00123               new ScoreRigidAlignments< NoTier1Score, WeightedSumsScore,
00124                                         align_T >(A_model, *A_args));
00125       }else if(A_args->score_str == "point_and_surf_score"){
00126         std::cout << "using site points and surface scoring method and fine tuning of the best alignment\n";
00127         score(alignments, align_method,
00128               new ScoreRigidAlignments< NoTier1Score, point_and_surf_score,
00129                                         align_T >(A_model, *A_args));
00130       }else if(A_args->score_str == "HbondSurfacesScore" ||
00131                A_args->use_hbond_surfaces){
00132         std::cout << "Using hbond caps+ scoring method -- training method\n";
00133         score(alignments, align_method,
00134               new ScoreRigidAlignments< NoTier1Score, HbondSurfacesScore,
00135                                         align_T >(A_model, *A_args));
00136       }else if(A_args->score_str == "ModelSiteRMSD"){
00137         std::cout << "Only computing the RMSD of the alignments\n"
00138                   << "NOTE: this requires that the sites are already aligned\n\n";
00139         score(alignments, align_method,
00140               new ScoreRigidAlignments< NoTier1Score, ModelSiteRMSD,
00141                                         align_T >(A_model, *A_args));
00142       }else if(A_args->score_str == "sample_all_triangles"){
00143         std::cout << "This is a RESEARCH METHOD: it computes the RMSD for each all reasonable triangle matchs relative to the query and database starting positions -- it only makes sense in when the input sites are already aligned\n\n\n";
00144         score(alignments, align_method,
00145               new ScoreRigidAlignments< NoTier1Score, ModelSiteRMSD,
00146                                         align_T >(A_model, *A_args));
00147       }else if(A_args->score_str == "SiteIntersectionVolume"){
00148         std::cout << "THIS WAS REMOVED -- volume estimate must be much faster than site point score and spherical volumes are too much of an over estimate\n";
00149     //    std::cout << "Only computes the percentage of the query site volume estimate in the intersection of query site and dbase site\n\n";
00150     //    score(new ScoreRigidAlignments<SiteIntersectionVolume,
00151     //                                   CopyTier1Score< SiteIntersectionVolume > >(A_model, *A_args));
00152       }else{
00153         std::ostringstream ostr;
00154         ostr << "Unknown scoring method -- terminating\n"
00155              << "  Supported methods are:\n"
00156              << "    point_and_surf_score (Default)\n"
00157              << "    WeightedSumsScore (Faster than default, but less accurate)\n";
00158         err_msg(A_fname, "run()", ostr.str());
00159         return false;
00160       }
00161       return true;
00162     }
00163 
00166     template <typename scoring_T, typename align_T> bool
00167     score(std::vector<align_T> *alignments, const align_method_t align_method, 
00168           scoring_T* score_method)
00169     {
00170       std::ofstream results_out;
00171       if(!open_ofstream(results_out, A_args->ofname)) return false;
00172 //      if(A_args->save_rigid_scores && 
00173 //         !open_ofstream(rigid_results_out, A_args->ofname + ".rigid")) 
00174 //        return false;
00175       A_args->report_parameters(results_out);
00176 //      A_args->report_parameters(rigid_results_out);
00177     
00178       std::string sf_file = A_args->install_dir;
00179       sf_file += "/SimSite3DSoftParams/ext_prot_lig_score_fcns.conf";
00180       if(A_args->ext_score_method.length() == 0){
00181         if(!score_method->set_external_scoring_method(sf_file, "default")) 
00182           return false;
00183       }else if(!score_method->set_external_scoring_method(sf_file, A_args->ext_score_method)) return false;
00184       score_method->write_score_header(results_out);
00185 //      score_method->write_score_header(rigid_results_out);
00186    
00187       // Compare a pair of sitemaps
00188       if(A_args->dbase_file_name.length()){
00189         std::string path;
00190         std::string struct_id;
00191         get_path_and_struct_id(A_args->dbase_file_name, &path, &struct_id);
00192         alignments->clear();
00193         align_and_score_dset_site(alignments, score_method, align_method, path, 
00194                                   struct_id, results_out);
00195  
00196       // Blast model against structures in the database index file
00197       }else if(A_args->db_index_fname.length()){
00198         std::ifstream db_idx_file;
00199         if(!open_ifstream(db_idx_file, A_args->db_index_fname)) return false;
00200         std::cout << "Searching the database: (" << A_args->dbase_sites 
00201                   << ")\nUsing the database index file: (" 
00202                   << A_args->db_index_fname << ")\n";
00203        
00204         // Note: if this ever gets used in a nonsecure environment, we will
00205         // want to limit the number of lines read 
00206         std::vector<std::string> struct_ids;
00207         // Use the entire file
00208         if(A_args->db_start == 0 && A_args->db_stop == 0){
00209           std::cout << "Using all of the structures in the index file\n";
00210           for(std::string line; std::getline(db_idx_file, line); )
00211             struct_ids.push_back(line);
00212         // Use dbstart && dbstop
00213         }else{
00214           const int dbstart = A_args->db_start;
00215           const int dbstop =  A_args->db_stop;
00216           std::string line;
00217           int lineno = 1;
00218           for( ; std::getline(db_idx_file, line) && lineno <= dbstop; ++lineno)
00219             if(dbstart <= lineno) struct_ids.push_back(line);
00220           std::cout << "Using structures " << dbstart << " thru " << dbstop
00221                     << " in the index file\n";
00222         }
00223 
00224         std::vector<std::string>::const_iterator st_iter = struct_ids.begin();
00225         for( ; st_iter < struct_ids.end(); ++st_iter){
00226           alignments->clear();
00227           align_and_score_dset_site(alignments, score_method, align_method, 
00228                                     A_args->dbase_sites, *st_iter,
00229                                     results_out);
00230         }
00231 
00232       // Blast model against the database (actually a directory)
00233       }else{
00234         // Get a listing of all the files in dbase_dir
00235         struct dirent **dbfilelist;
00236         int n = scandir(A_args->dbase_sites.c_str(), &dbfilelist, 0, 0);
00237         if(n < 0){
00238           int errsv = errno;
00239           std::cerr << "Unable to get a listing of the files to search.\n"
00240                     << "Scandir failed: " << strerror(errsv);
00241           if(errsv == ENOENT)
00242             std::cerr << " (" << A_args->dbase_sites.c_str() << ")";
00243           std::cerr << "\n";
00244           return false;
00245         }
00246 
00247         std::cout << "Searching the database: (" << A_args->dbase_sites 
00248                   << ")\n";
00249     
00250         // The tag denoting a sitemap labels file is the suffix "_s.csv".
00251         while(n--){ 
00252           // Check if file in dbase_dir is a sitemap and remove the last 6 chars
00253           // to arrive at the structure id
00254           std::string struct_id = dbfilelist[n]->d_name;
00255           if(struct_id.length() < 6 || 
00256              struct_id.substr(struct_id.length() - 6) != "_s.csv"){
00257             free(dbfilelist[n]);
00258             continue;
00259           }
00260           struct_id.erase(struct_id.end() - 6, struct_id.end());
00261     
00262           alignments->clear();
00263           align_and_score_dset_site(alignments, score_method, align_method, 
00264                                     A_args->dbase_sites, struct_id,
00265                                     results_out);
00266           free(dbfilelist[n]);
00267         }
00268          free(dbfilelist);
00269       }
00270       results_out.close();
00271     
00272       // Need to check if this is a "normalization" run or "actual" run
00273       std::vector<std::string> tokens;
00274       string_tok(A_args->proj_output, &tokens, '/');
00275       if(tokens.back().substr(0,13) != ".SimSite3D_tmp_")
00276         std::cout << "You may find the results of your search in\n  "
00277                   << A_args->proj_output << "\n";
00278      
00279       return true;
00280     }
00281 
00283     bool
00284     set_alignment_method(align_method_t *align_method)
00285     {
00286       *align_method = UNKNOWN_ALIGNMENT_METHOD;
00287       if(A_args->alignments_fname.length()){
00288         *align_method = FROM_RESULTS_FILE;
00289         std::cout << "NOTE: using given results file ("
00290                   << A_args->alignments_fname << ") for alignments\n";
00291       }else if(A_args->align_to_query){
00292         *align_method = TRIANGLE_MATCHES;
00293       }else if( A_args->num_rand_aligns){
00294         *align_method = RANDOM_SAMPLING;
00295         return false;
00296       }else{
00297         *align_method = NO_ALIGNMENT;
00298       } 
00299       return true;
00300     }
00301 
00302   private:
00304     void init_vars();
00305 
00309 
00312     template < typename scoring_T, typename align_T > bool
00313     align_and_score_dset_site(std::vector<align_T> *alignments, 
00314                               scoring_T *score_method,
00315                               const align_method_t align_method,
00316                               const std::string target_sitemap_path,
00317                               const std::string struct_id, 
00318                               std::ofstream& results_out)
00319     {
00320       // 1 Load target sitemap
00321       DbaseSitemap dbase_site(target_sitemap_path, struct_id, *A_args,
00322                               A_args->max_corr_surf_pt_dist,
00323                               A_args->check_all_triangles, 
00324                               A_args->use_hbond_surfaces);
00325       if(dbase_site.fail()){
00326         std::string msg = "Failed to initialize the sitemap:\n\t";
00327         err_msg(A_fname, "align_and_score_target", 
00328                 msg + target_sitemap_path + "/" + struct_id);
00329         return false;
00330       }
00331 
00332       // 2 Generate alignments to move target to query
00333       A_model->revert(true, true);
00334       align(A_model, dbase_site, alignments, align_method);
00335 
00336       // 3 Score all alignments
00337       score_method->score_alignments(*alignments, &dbase_site, results_out);
00338       return true;
00339     }
00340 
00341     template < typename align_T > bool
00342     align(ModelSitemap *query_site, Sitemap &dset_site, 
00343           std::vector<align_T> *alignments, const align_method_t align_method)
00344     {
00345       if(align_method == NO_ALIGNMENT){
00346         IdentityAlignment my_align;
00347         my_align.align(query_site, dset_site, alignments);
00348       }else if(align_method == TRIANGLE_MATCHES){
00349         MatchTriangles my_align(A_args->dmetol, A_args->lsetol, 
00350                                 A_args->allow_hphob_triangles);
00351         my_align.align(query_site, dset_site, alignments);
00352       }else if(align_method == FROM_RESULTS_FILE){
00353         AlignmentsFromResultsFile my_align(A_args->alignments_fname);
00354         my_align.align(query_site, dset_site, alignments);
00355       }else if(align_method == RANDOM_SAMPLING){
00356         std::cout << "Unimplemented sampling method -- cannot continue\n";
00357         return false;
00358       }else if(align_method == GRID_SAMPLING){
00359         std::cout << "Unimplemented sampling method -- cannot continue\n";
00360         return false;
00361       }else{
00362         std::cout << "Unknown sampling method -- cannot continue\n";
00363         return false;
00364       }
00365       if(alignments->size() > 0) return true;
00366       return false;
00367     }

00375     static const std::string A_fname;  
00376   };
